text: Michał Ozga (born 23 June 2000), is a Polish professional footballer who plays as a centre back or defensive midfielder for Wigry Suwałki on loan from Jagiellonia Białystok.http://www.90minut.pl/kariera.php?id=31902 ==References== ==External links== * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Hutnik Nowa Huta players Category:Jagiellonia Białystok players Category:Wigry Suwałki players Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:I liga players
title: Michał Ozga
